website_summaries.verdict: An affordable quesadilla maker that works as promised.
pros: Easy to use, as it heats up quickly and has a nonstick surface that makes cleanup a breeze
Comes at a reasonable price point
cons: Hinge and latch have been known to break

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: I gave this 4 stars because of the latch. I had another brand with the same latch and it broke. I was hoping this one would be different. I am very careful with it but grandkids not so. Hoping it will last. Otherwise great.
customer_reviews.author: Izzy hu

customer_reviews.title: Performed well, but the lights don’t work right
customer_reviews.text: The instructions say the red light will go out and the green one will go on and that means it’s ready. But the red light never went out. There was a glimmer in the green light. It was confusing. One of my quesadillas came out great, though. The other less so.
customer_reviews.author: I came, I saw, I ordered

customer_reviews.title: Makes descent quesadillas, but the clamp broke off.
customer_reviews.text: The clamp that closes the quesadilla maker broke off the first time I used it. It still works, but now I have to use pot holders to open and close it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Easy, easy, easy!
customer_reviews.text: Used for 1st time yesterday to make quesadillas- all was great!
customer_reviews.author: Jimi

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use & clean and makes yummy quesadillas!!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this quite a few times so far, and it works great! Works better with larger tortillas than smaller ones, but both come out delicious! My husband and I are both gluten free so we use corn tortillas and have had no issues even though the directions say to use flour tortillas. It heats up in a few minutes and is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: It took over 20 minutes for it to get WARM.
customer_reviews.text: Took 20 minutes for it to get warm, and I mean only warm.
customer_reviews.author: ck

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: It came chipped top bubbled and didn’t burn deep sections
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyable item
customer_reviews.text: Gifted this item but so far it’s perfect. The receiver was very pleased with the easy use and clean up. The only concern was they were not able to warm larger tortilla shells
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Totally love this.. we use it for our business an its so easy to use an clean.
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Came out of the box with dents, scratches and ...
customer_reviews.text: Came out of the box with dents, scratches and dings. Plus looked as if it had been used already. Returned it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Package was not damaged, but hinge broken when opened box up. No quality control
customer_reviews.author: Greg E. Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Not 100% satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Latch on it loose and comes off easily and it doesn’t close right
customer_reviews.author: Penny Messmore

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, easy clean up and with PRIME I received it the very next day!! Very Happy Customer~
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Fike

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a Christmas gift. Came with a liquid that had dried up in oil collecter,.plus the cord had been rewound and not well either, the plug protection was missing, we bought them another one which was new. I cleaned it up and kept it...I was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Less greasy
customer_reviews.text: I love it, I'm a terrible cook and even I can use it. I also like that you dont have to use butter on the shells. If you want you have Crispy non greasy shells.
customer_reviews.author: Peter V.

customer_reviews.title: Not the 6" as stated
customer_reviews.text: This unit is not a 6" as stated It states as 6" on the box but is measured at 8". Not that it is a bad unit but it has no manufacture contact or warranty information on or in the box. Not the fault of the seller other not insuring they were selling what was described. If you want a 8" quesadilla maker buy it for cheap but dont expect to get what the description says. Seller will take returns but you pay postage to send it back So Not Worth It.
customer_reviews.author: A view

customer_reviews.title: I had a different brand before it was much better.
customer_reviews.text: Too hard to open and shut and the groove around the edge isn't big enough. Also it doesn't seal the triangles. I had a different brand before it was much better.
customer_reviews.author: Drey57

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little counter machine
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter the quesadilla queen,say that last bit three times fast. Great little machine, deeper pockets than her aunt's, which means more cheesy goodness. Precut lines. All around good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Joi

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The opener does not work very well. It keeps stopping before it finishes opening the can. Once opening is complete, it doesn't release the lid. You have to hold down the can sensor switch for it to complete releasing the lid.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Moores

customer_reviews.title: nice product
customer_reviews.text: a great supper idea-when I can't think of what to make I just keeptortillas on hand and you can put just about anything in them. The maker works great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Nephew loves this Quesdilla maker!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my nephew & he uses it every single day. Money 💰 well spent!! BEST GIFT EVER!!
customer_reviews.author: RLord

customer_reviews.title: It works but not well at all
customer_reviews.text: No matter how much cheese you put in it’s coming out and getting everywhere. Like even 1/8th cup cheese and you’re making a mess. But... it does work I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Chandelier Bong

customer_reviews.title: Brentwood Quesadilla Maker  GREAT and would recommend
customer_reviews.text: The Brentwood Quesadilla Maker is a great product. It does everything they advertise it will. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Annette M Mongar

customer_reviews.title: A great little work horse!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I've made cheese and pork, a taco quesadilla! Can't wait to try a fish taco quesadilla. Crazy I know but I love quesadillas.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love it. When I tried it for the first time, it was perfect. I get a lot of use out of it. Highly recommended. 👍
customer_reviews.author: GNico

product_meta.title: Brentwood Quesadilla Maker, 8-inch, Red
product_meta.description: Use the Brentwood TS-120 8 Inch Quesadilla Maker to produce all types of hot and delicious quesadillas. Create a variety of tasty quesadillas in just minutes thanks to 900 powerful watts. Features power and pre heat indicator lights. Easily remove quesadillas from the easy to clean non-stick plates. Removable drip tray collects any spillage. Locking lid and vertical feet allow the unit to stand upright for incredibly small storage in between uses.
feature_bullets: The Brentwood Quesadilla Maker produces an 8 inch quesadilla
Smartly designed plates create 6 sectional pieces
Powerful 900 watt quesadilla maker produces quesadillas in minutes
Non-stick plates simply wipe down clean
Includes removable drip tray for less mess

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars85 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
